game.name: SpelBrawl
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: SpelBrawl is a roguelite word game with challenging and rewarding gameplay. Play solo to unlock spells, intervals, and unique characters to extend words. Battle others online and test your luck to become the ultimate SpelBrawler!
game.shortDescriptionEn: SpelBrawl is a roguelite word game with challenging and rewarding gameplay. Play solo to unlock spells, intervals, and unique characters to extend words. Battle others online and test your luck to become the ultimate SpelBrawler!
